name: fascism

a political system based on a very powerful leader, state control, and being extremely proud of country and race, and in which political opposition is not allowed
Examples
This year's history syllabus covers the rise of Fascism in Europe.Fascism develops from right-wing extremism, supported traditionally by the middle classes, in contrast to Communism.
